official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Burr Trail National Rural Scenic Road in the State of Utah, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Burr Trail National Rural Scenic Road, Utah, as a unit of the National Park System. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct an interpretive center in Boulder, Utah. Authorizes the Secretary to accept a right-of-way for such Road through donation by Utah. Restricts the use of the Road by certain large vehicles.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Burr Trail National Rural Scenic Road in the State of Utah, and for other purposes.
